h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Yellowbrow (Round Two)
content: The true mischievous lord that you've met beforehand will finally take his rightful place, and bestow upon you the third Sage's Relic: the Hubris Nose. You'll be able to reveal one of three perks with it:
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Yellowbrow (Round Two)'.
The content is as follows:
The true mischievous lord that you've met beforehand will finally take his rightful place, and bestow upon you the third Sage's Relic: the Hubris Nose. You'll be able to reveal one of three perks with it:
